analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x1ba0ab6ef2d6fbd773fec0dd7f4633ae360db65e.sol:
	Contract ChoweToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x1ba0ab6ef2d6fbd773fec0dd7f4633ae360db65e.sol#248-249)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x1ba0ab6ef2d6fbd773fec0dd7f4633ae360db65e.sol#55-58) is not in mixedCase
